mapper.select: select * from music_member order by user_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into music_member values((select max(user_no) from music_member) +1, #{user_id}, #{user_pwd},#{user_name},#{user_gender}, #{user_email}, #{user_phone}, 0, sysdate,'',2)
mapper.update: update music_member set user_no = user_no -1 where user_no > #{user_no}
update music_member set user_purchase = 0 where user_no = #{user_no}
